I have no family to celebrate it with cause my aunt doesnt even recognize the day...soooooo i want any one who wants to take me out and do something that day to....CALL ME at (718) 423-1168 or else! ...please so if u dont call me tht day...tiny ants will carry u off in the middle of the night and eat you. drop a comment if u can or even if u cant do something that day, or invite me to join u later

it's times like these you learn to live again it's times like these you give and give again it's times like these you learn to love again it's times like these time and time again I'm a little divided do I stay or run away and leave it all behind

today as well i heard about a highschool student who lost his hands and legs and still went on and graduated and even was on the wrestling team for four years. I need to be more grateful of what i have including the fact that i dont live in foster care nemore ever since my parents died and my aunt took me in. I dont know where id be without her.

Fuck im stuck in this hell for another week cant go to jersey next week Its up to U to get me out of this house everyday next week so i wont go insane. This has been a public service announcement of the please help me orginazation....now back to your regularly schedueled program.

Ok lets see, what an exciting week it has turned out to be, not one day have i been left without something to do. Ok thursday, my first day of freedom i hung out with joanna and her friend natashia, and had fun, saw day after tommorow, such a cliche disaster movie. Friday has a awesome time a boddy's house. They always cheer me up she has such a spunky refreshing personality that u cant help but to smile. We watched lord of the rings.....two of em thats right like6 hours of LOTR, thats a lot of movie watching, her dad has an awesome accent and her mom is reallly nice,she payed for my cab thank her again for me will ya christin. Amanda was there, i missed her so much, and christina and maria...i was the only guy and u think that stoped me from thier guy talks?...lol no. well now it is time for wor once agian.....theres nothing to do there so chances r i will probably sulk. well yea c ya all later.
oh poo i SAID wake me up when it stops! people never listen......uggggg i give up....c ya all september

hey....guess what....ya...that right IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE!IM DONE! YES!!! now the good ol summer can begin and i can do whatever i want and go on vacation by myself ....well go there by myself but stay with my fun family. I think im going next monday for a couple of days. Had the very annoying chem regents today....so stupid. Then i got home and quikly ran upstairs and then grabbed all my books and then ran to the dumpster and dumped them all and slammed the lid shut...then went to my bed and had a nice well deserved nap.......sleep is good. well call me if ya wanna hang.later now im off to work....shit my sister is home...got to get out before the bullshit beginns.... later **zips away leaving a cloud that is in the shape of rich**

There is no-one to count on anymore. ...wake me when you stop where is this bus goin going going meh dont care then i got lost so very tired dont want to wake up tommorow for the pointlessness i want to take a trip...to california a road trip....with my best buds with out a care without a plan

blah im in the ol' cant sort my thoughts mode these past days if something fun doesnt happen soon i shall die of boredom and i will be a mush of boringness.......oh and watch out for the cactapus now i have to stay home for two days cause we have a infestation of the fuzzy kind a family of squirls has invaded this once peaceful land. We have cage set up and when we catch them im eating them and ill make the other squirls watch me eat thier relatives as a warning to all of the other squirls ill set one free to report to the rest, i figure what the hey if i get rabies ill just give it to evyone and itll be a grand ol' time with everyone foaming at the mouth...muahaha well newho wish me luck with the sorting out of thoughts and takin the damn pesky regents'. see ya kids later

well hello its that time the time of cram, I hate it this week is the worst, got the worst test's ahead, this is where the real cramming comes into effect it is time for chem., I studied all day today went outside grabbed a coolata first(caramel swirl is THE best) then I did the old regents' and surprisingly did somewhat well. Of course I got distracted. One time there was a bee that was dying and kept on fluttering and spazing out on the floor and I got scared it was just pretending and the second it came to close BAM it would attack me. Then I moved and there was another bee this time it was flying so I ran away and went to the other benches. The I sat down and decided it was too cold in the shade, so I went to the sun. The sun was in my eyes so I moved again. I went back to the shade and then pretty soon someone started BQ ing so I started to think about food. Then a lady comes up to me and tells me to not to forget to throw out my cup when I was done, this reminded me of prep so I wanted to hit her with a large hammer but I forgot it at home. ok now two days and the hell begins.....math...tomorrow I have a review class and at least Christina will be there to keep me from utter boredom and despair, then next day ill fail the math b and study some MORE chem. The fun never stops....never..... Oh and UPDATE on band...we have a drummer now and I’m working on a link for our songs.....all lyrics and poems are the sole rights of Theresa Heller records **little c thingy**.---END

There is nothing here for me in this house, I cant take it, I ran away tonight but returned cause I had nowhere to stay cause I couldn't contact anyone....Its really bad. I need out.....

The sex pistols are great, im dedicated to listen to them enough so develope a britsh accent. And now a question for those who read to entertain in thier silly minds. Has anyone ever took a step back and thought about all the people who have problems, i mean the basic teen problems, and thought to themselves that most of them are the same? Yes im sure most of u have...but then has anyone ever stood back for a moment and ever tried to see the reason as to why these problems develope? Well of course we can not fathom this since most people are different and none can ever see the full picture...but. Is anyone sick of the hate that develops in our lives...the hate between people, the quest to be cool or the quest to be happy ussually ends in some one loosing...and another question...has anyone ever tried to help or care outside of talking to them online?...i was just wondering if i was the only person who had these questions, i feel like the only one who thinks of this stuff. Oh well just a thought Anywho im hoping next year will be flled with meeting new freinds and new exctiing thigs happen. Oh and on an awesome note i might get into NROTC, which means i can go to college for four years and THEN be a navy officer and begin my piolot career sooner, as well as be a IT guy ( information systems technician , basically otherwise known as computer technician) thats the job i picked today. I begin basic July 21st so its less than a year then the fun begins...im so happy im on the road to living my dream already. Yes today was a busy busy day...tommrow i shall try to relax finnaly...hmm i still need to go to lake george i still have alot of thinking to accomlish and i cant do it with Mrs. Nagy Mcnagyson here. Well thats all for now..oh and i had an interesing time testerday....hmm i have to think about it but it seems interesting as of yet,but u know how things change.
someone changed thier hair

Yesterday there was alot of yelling and grief in my house so natasia was nice enough to let me come over her house, so i fixed her computer its now running squeaky clean and then saw fight club, thus the phylisophical post two posts down. Fight club is an awesome movie, very sad at the end but awesome nonethe less. Then i went home and got yelled at more...apparently there will be DIRE consequenses...ha living here is dire enough.
Some of the best things happen randomly...im talking about those things that make ure arm go numb and ure teeth shake.

Every day I feel like im loosing my edge...Like a giant sword is cutting my existence into two part then tiny people are building an indestructible wall. I have forgotten some things, some things that used to be part of my life, some things that made me who I am. I am less caring as the days go by and by whose hand is this fate brought by? The hand is my own, when I wake up tomorrow, none of this will matter. Life is just a dying and birth, that repeats everyday. We all go to bed with some sort of accomplishments in our hands, some sort of structure we have built inside ourselves, and the next day is just a clean slate that we can eat off of, a clean slate indeed. The same mundane thing every damn day, all hoping that one day, we will wake up and finally be the person we have been meaning to be all along, but of course we fall asleep not thinking of this, wake up like everyday ready to make that clean slate into something great and add it to the giant library of our lives. I say I am going to finally stop drawing on little slates, I wish to make a mural that will stare me in the face each day I awake. Now is the time to act. tomorrow starts the first day, in which I will become who I want to be, I will stop holding back, being the same damn rich everyone knows and expects to be...clothes do not make me, music does not make me, friends do not make me, where I live and what I do do not make me, but every single moment does.....For now every single moment is who I will be, I am now I am not tomorrow, I am here I am not there, what comes doesn't matter.

yes i was on a bit of a holiday in jersey had to take the train of wich i now dispise, went to visit fam. and theresa,did that and came back. I missed home but now next wednesday im off to lake george, tis will be fun but lonely, and laura if ure reading this i have completed my first traditional summer letter of summing up the yearness. I believe i shall email it to ya. I wish chris could come with me but he cant this summer, so what i will do with my self i shall not know. I guess ittl be a good time to thin about stuff, theres always a ton of stuff to think about....or go to shooting range, either which. I can go canoeing or something, or fishing, meh ittl be nice. Alrighty im going to stop for i have nothing else to write so u may now continue with ure internet browsing. later

I put up a link to the right of videos I thought were awesome so if u have broadband and got some time then check em out. Also for the picture link when I get a digital camera I will put a ton of pictures up...but for now its whatever I think is cool, and the pics I have already, so check those links regularly cause I DO update them.
And were done everything is coool now i feel really happy and hyper now, cant wait for tommorow, and yea...i feel so optomistic now..its so nice. Ok im out before good mood dissapears. Later

I shall arrive in jersey, but tognight I have to finalize everything. I have to get someone to cover for me at work...so nikki if ure reading this and I haven't contacted you then give me a ring cause ill get u out of Saturday morning work..ok? Alright I have that to do then call Theresa and see if she can pick me up from the train station...sorry if im being such a pain but I have to do this now or else i will die from not seeing you. But what sucks about that is i cant go to lake george from thier cause thiers not enoguh room in the car so ill have to go back to penn and take the train to lake george....and they said that vacations were stress free, bull. Ok when that is all complete i have three problems to take care of...the navy crap, then the girl crap, wait dont care anyome so that is never going to go anywhere cause i give up on it indefinately now. Then i can completely relax ....and that will give me about a week of mental relaxation. Mark my words, next year i will be so far from caring and interacting that some people will forget i exist, so that means take care for some. A aggressive statement, yes but something has to change, Im being too drained. Well thats my curent state at the moment, im free to hang monday and tuesday of next week so drop a line. -rich

I had a revelation that girls are like pants, I guess...oh well ill sleep on it. Something def. has to change, maybe ill revert to antisocialisim again, but people might complain...who knows.

ahhhh so yesterday had the greatest time with my buds chritine and jess two of my most awesome friends that i havnt seen in months and was dying to see, got my nails painted green and black by christine and raided thier friends house and ate sausage cheese and crakers and listend to jess' fav band "folly". Then day before was band practice which was absolutely awesome, we accomplished the song "got no" I am so proud of myself and ryan for pulling it together it is truly the best we have done sofar. Then we were messing around and since nikki was recording our entire pratice and ryan was trying out some new stuff on his guitar without the distortions (which made it sound emoish) i just started pulling words out of my asss like stuff that would be in an emo song and itcame out with my lemonade leaving me and i dont know why, great stuff very funny. Ryan was shocked how good it sounded for me just pulling words out of my ass seriously u should have seen his face, and nikki couldnt stop laughing. well we have it on tape if ya like to take a looksies. Now today i have work, tommorow im going to the hilton hotel till friday curtysey of the navy for a medical checkup. Then sat to sunday possible lan party IF steve asks, well he better. then from there on out its anyones guess....oh and about warped...yes well ill go for like the three bands i want to see(if only punks vs phsycos tour came here), ya a waste of money but whatever. BUT i have to decide either NY or NJ one cause i want ta go with my friend Theresa cause shes uber cool andlives in NJ and if u have a reason otherwise why i should go to NY's dont be a startnger and drop a note alrighty kids im done

but i dont get it im not goign to push anything she doesnt understand that it doesnt matter i already explained it then why is she so afraid i guess it was nice knowing her this is always exactly what i was afraid of... -sigh-

yes that is correct my friends i went to the beach toay....AMAZING ISNT IT! but if u think i went into the ocean it was only cause mia took my wallet. So i got to see kayla, Mia, Laura(a rare sighting indeed) and somebody else....cant remember name....hmmm o well im bad with that stuff anywhoo..... Came home realized i had a sunburn ate a gigantic ham sandwich with toasted english muffins and then took a nap cause food and beach make me sleepy. Then got into arguments with aunt shes a bich yada yada couldnt play SWG, wanted to yada yada and here i am...now i cant wait till sunday for that will be when joanna gets home...yay. and now to not play SWG...god damn it.

ahh the days of summer endless gaming, sleeping going online watching conan, drinking tons of soada, not having to step outside exceptfor the occasional Mcdonals, which they made easier cause now they have debit machines. Hangign out once in awile with people who dont annoy the heck out of me....ahhh. the only thing that would make this better is if my aunt wasnt here cause then she wouldnt be here to tell me to get off the computer cuase id still be on it (my main gaming computer not the laptop im on now for clarrification) now if it wasnt for that...yes. oh and ONCE and only ONCE we have to plan some sort of lan part/movie party...or guys we can just mush it together as in we have it but then me rob ed and steve just stay when everyone else leaves...HA! its genious!!!!!
hmmm i just saw a news report that says playing video games creates obecity, then they applauded games like ddr or some stupid boxing game.... yes i knew i was getting a little too fat.

no i never think things through i never know how to handle anything that goes on in my head and act to quick i guess in someways its care free, and nice but not when u run someone over in the proccess, then it really sux. Not in a selfish way but in a sympathetic way....if i were u id never talk to me again, but somethings cant be solved only ignored until it festers and it annoys u until u dont care anymore but alot comes at that price....too much, and it isnt worth it. if ure wondering what the hell im babling about, i dont really know im just writing without thinking.

i had a very entertaining time today hung out with joanna and natashia and i cant remember the last time i laughed that hard thanks guys we ate laughed alot about nothing and saw spider man 2, much better than the original then walked em home waited at me bus stop. The bus took forever so i even helped out a bunch of pot heads fix thier bike and natashia called me a boy scout, but im a manscout. Bus finnaly came took a reallyslow walk home watched some nighborhood firworks and here i am. and now thier goin on vacation, ill miss ya guys...and now on to sleep....
the screwing over meh never ends ever i guess kayla was wrong

Fight Club! urlLink What movie Do you Belong in?(many different outcomes!) brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Okee the 4th has arisen from the shit that it once has fallen in(dont think too much about that statement) ANYWHOO hmm today twas interesting folks, i had the apointment with a navy recruter dude. It was an enlightening expirience, first off i couldnt even find the place i got off at the wrong stop only o realize i have to walk a dozen blocks to get there, it was nice to be stared at by a bunch of illegals waiting for work at every corner..psh...flushing. Then i found the place sat down with one of the officers and he told me stuff then he let me take a test which related to a fourth graders test, except for the parts where they ask u to find the square root of a number to the nearest tenth and all the options have decimals in it u just kinda end up squaring all the options to see which one is correct, which is annoying. Then he asked me questions such as what is my life goal, lie where do see myself in 4 years....and im thinking i dont know what im going to do tommorow how would i kow that so all i answered him was, flying jets and working on computer systems. Then he went on to talk about how when u get out of college jobs are looking for really qualified individuals or someone with a lot of expirience which college alone doesnt offer, which is true. With the NROTC program i could just specialize in an exact field of work...which translates into job training right away which furthurmore translates into getting paid which further translates into i will have alota mula quicker. And the navy pays for EVERYTHING which is extreamly awesome, he told me free housing, free car, no or reduced taxes, all in return for some service which i dont mind. And after four years i can petition for officer training and once that is complete i can fly jet planes and bombers. He also showed me all the things he has become certifed for which closly resembles the profession trees in SWG, which is also similar becuase u can train for whaever u want at anytime, all u have to do is ask and he said u learn by expirience...like say u want to learn to be a helmsman the captain puts u in the contol and guides u, and u do that eseveral times and he certifies u, its like gaining expirience points. So it sounds awesome and ill investigate furthure i guess and if all this hold true say goodbye to applying to colleges cause he said if u are willing to follow through thier is no need to appy to college cause u get specialized job training at the college of ure choice for free anyway and the navy handles all the paper work. Exciting. So thats what i learned today. Ok see ya kids on the 4th later

US Marine Corps Rules for Gunfights 1. Be courteous to everyone, friendly to no one. 2. Decide to be aggressive ENOUGH, quickly ENOUGH. 3. Have a plan. 4. Have a back-up plan, because the first one probably won't work. 5. Be polite. Be professional. But, have a plan to kill everyone you meet. 6. Do not attend a gunfight with a handgun whose caliber does not start with a "4." 7. Anything worth shooting is worth shooting twice. Ammo is cheap. Life is expensive. 8. Move away from your attacker. Distance is your friend. (Lateral & diagonal preferred.) 9. Use cover or concealment as much as possible. 10. Flank your adversary when possible. Protect yours. 11. Always cheat; always win. The only unfair fight is the one you lose. 12. In ten years, nobody will remember the caliber, stance, or tactics. They will remember who lived. 13. If you are not shooting, you should be communicating. Navy SEALS Rules For Gunfights 1. Look very cool in sunglasses. 2. Kill every living thing within view. 3. Return quickly to looking cool in latest beach wear. 4. Check hair in mirror. US Army Rangers Rules For Gunfights 1. Walk in 50 miles wearing 75 pound ruck while starving. 2. Locate individuals requiring killing. 3. Request permission via radio from "Higher" to perform killing. 4. Curse bitterly when mission is aborted. 5. Walk out 50 miles wearing a 75 pound ruck while starving. Army Rules For Gunfights 1. Select a new beret to wear 2. Sew combat patch on right shoulder 3. Change the color of beret you decide to wear US Air Force Rules For Gunfights 1. Have a cocktail 2. Adjust temperature on air-conditioner 3. See what's on HBO 4. Determine "what is a gunfight" 5. Request more funding from Congress with a "killer" Power Point presentation 6. Wine & dine 'key' Congressmen, invite DoD & defense industry executives 7. Receive funding, set up new command and assemble assets 8. Declare the assets "strategic" and never deploy them operationally 9. Tell the Navy to send the Marines US Navy Rules For Gunfights 1. Go to Sea 2. Drink Coffee 3. Watch porn 4. Send the Marines yes i know im going into the navy but still its funny

work...sat thier watched tv gamed...sat there moved the mouse around and got owned sadly in splinter cell chatted...read a movie script...watched my freinds trailer to his movie...etc. slept....laid thier...and breathed and put my eyes closed well i didnt do that yet, but im sure I will, and of course u all want a complete report on my day now dont you?

Its 8:11 i got to be at work in a bit so lets cut this short I had an awesome time yesterday, pure awesomness, loud and fast awesomeness Went with sam and Jamie...had THE most funny thing happen to her, well this guy wanted to borrow her phone and....hahahha i wont say ...suckers. Tiger army is an awesome band, i was soooo tired after thier ...thing. Well had some great summer memories thier, thanks sam and Jamie fer letting me tag along. Im out to fun -rich

Someone tell me what the hell is up with everyone and thier damn quest to find one person to make them feel special...WILL SOMEEONE WAKE UP!! dear god i believe i will be on a tower with a rifle pretty soon. Everyone takes crap too serious....ergo this statment right here, i know maybe a bit contradictory but what im sick of THisss the whole dating craze!!! everyone stop!! UHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH u dont need one person to make u happy if something happenes it happens!!! and if it does don't treat it like the ONLY THING going on in ure life then a couple of months later u complain then its the same old cycle again! there r more important things! sorry for the bold statements but somone has to make some sorta statement! ugh im just frustrated cause these r our teen years and we are treating it like we are 40 ...someone tell me u feel the same...im not crazy am i? dont answer that, i know im being sorta crazy ...ughhh but..er still

Hmm i had a long post but me being an idiot i forgot to post it before i uh closed the box...well anywhoo. Todas had band practice, verry awesome we had one of me best buds christina there, gosh i love that child, yes thats right, u are my child. Well actually shes our bass player now, and awesome at that. It would have been a complete practice if Al wasnt such an ass and told us earlier that he couldnt be our drummer, god all this time we coulve been getting a new one...err what an ass. Then we just chilled. And u know what i realized? i realized that all i had today was that frapamocha thingy(i dont remeber christina picked it out fer me) today and the coffecake majig. So just before i ate a whole box of crackers and 10 olives...am i living the college life style already? i think so well now to go to bed and wake up at 1....ahhhh summmerrr p.s. and a thanks to random people who stumble across my site ure comments r awesome :)
The MTA is raising thier fairs again...thats right they ARE bastards

Twas an interesting sorta week...i did...stuff....slept late most of the days..really late then went out and did stuff....it all seems to blend in after a wile. Yesterday i went to Tashias house and saw Goldeneye, again..yes i know BUT she never saw it..can u believe it? Yes well i made her watch it to save her life, then we watched Donnie Darko, a strange movie indeed but very great as well...i still dont understand it but with furthur annalasis im sure ill figure it out.
